scripts.start: npm i && npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/generate-mongo-init.js && npm run db:up
scripts.dump: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/dump.js dotenv_config_path=.env
scripts.data-scope: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/data-scope.js dotenv_config_path=.env
scripts.merge-rent-commercials: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/merge-duplicates-rent-commercials.js dotenv_config_path=.env
scripts.merge-sale-commercials: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/merge-duplicates-sale-commercials.js dotenv_config_path=.env
